title: National Margarita Day | Key West Events at The Gates Hotel
seo_description: It’s National Margarita Day and who doesn’t love Margaritas? Each of our bartenders from both hotels have created their own Margarita recipe! Vote on your favorite Margarita specials and the winning bartender gets a prize! Enjoy delicious Latin Inspired cuisine from Chef Justin at the Toasted Coconut // Blind Pig!
short_description: It’s National Margarita Day and who doesn’t love Margaritas? Each of our bartenders from both hotels have created their own Margarita recipe!
